name: SurveyStack
description: Survey Software for Community Knowledge Building

SDGs.evidenceText: This is used with the Bionutrient Food Association group in order to collect and share food quality and nutrient density data.  We've collected thousands of data points across 40 states in the US and europe.
Used for distributed manufacturing groups - like through the group Beneficial Bio who uses our software to support their manufacturing in multiple continents
We use surveystack with projects for carbon sequestration, for example the Quick Carbon project from Yale was performed in SurveyStack using Our Sci tools (Reflectometer)
